corpname.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

unittitle.value: Archives of Irish America Collection on <emph render="italic">The Quiet Man</emph>

extent.value: in 3 film canisters, 1 oversize folder, and 2 oversize posters.

abstract.value: The materials in this collection were collected and assembled by the staff of the Archives of Irish America and various donors in an attempt to document ethnic and cultural aspects of the 1952 John Ford film, <emph render="italic">The Quiet Man</emph>. The collection includes an original 35mm print and an oversized theater poster of the film.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Archives of Irish America Collection on <emph render="italic">The Quiet Man</emph>; AIA 042; box number; folder number; Archives of Irish America, Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
The provenance of the materials in this collection is unknown. The accession number associated with the materials is 1997.033.

The materials in this collection were collected and assembled by the staff of the Archives of Irish America and various donors in an attempt to document ethnic and cultural aspects of the 1952 John Ford film, <emph render="italic">The Quiet Man</emph>.

This collection consists of memorabilia related to John Ford's 1952 film <emph render="italic">The Quiet Man</emph>. The collection includes an original 35mm print, an oversized theater poster of the film, and movie posters.
